page.title: 12HOUSING IN THE SHREWLEY AREA
page.content: Shrewley area is not densely housed but properties are well preserved. 90% of all houses are owner occupied, while less than 4% are owned by the District Council. Some of the houses have been renovated up to a very high standard. In other parts of Shrewley the houses are quite large averaging at least four bedrooms. Prices are high for the Midlands area.A 3 bedroom semi-detached will cost about #47,000. Out towards the northern part of Shrew- ley, one tends to find only farms and public houses. There is some concern about the number of new houses gradually being built. Each new house helps destroy the small community atmosphere.
